title: (x) A golf course - Trade Gothic {Franz}
content:
I'm an idiot - it ain't Officina, It ain't any Helvetica, no Gill, no Folio...what am I missing that I can't figure this out.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132357im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26381.jpg)
author: tsprowl

comments.content: My bad, it's [Trade Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132357/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold/testdrive.html?s=A%2BGOLF%2BCOURSE%2C&p=60), not condensed, and not Bold No. 2, either.
I favor trade gothic bold but it could also be a flavor of Knockout
I favor trade gothic bold but it could also be a flavor of Knockout
Doh! got a page error and hit the submit button again. sorry folks.

What the.. I hacked in my reply as soon as I got the topic notification mail, and still you're 2 minutes faster. You're obviously so advanced that you can identify samples _before_ they are posted. Whoa. What can I do to get to that level?

Well, against my ISP's request, I set my send & receive schedule to every two minutes. Combine that with how long it takes the Typophile server to send out the notification, which is sometimes faster than others, and there it is.   
   
Now, while I had the faster ID, I opted to post it w/o a link, so while I was away, getting the link and then realizing my mistake, you'd slipped in with the right ID. So it is I who bow to you, Franz. The time thing was just luck on my part.   
   
Oh, and Tanya? You are no idiot by any stretch. A little starry-eyed sometimes, though... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132357im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Oh. Luck, huh? And here I was thinking your typographic prowess actually enabled you to tear gateways in the fabric of space-time.. Duh. I look really stupid now.

aww man! you guys are the bestest. had I only gone through the T folder before calling it quits.   
   
its trade gothic bold yeah - thanks a million!
Franz, he lies. You get the time travel when you pay your uppercase membership.
